mapper.update: update t_borrowdetail set fpic = #{fpic}, ypic = #{ypic},tpic = #{tpic},qpic = #{qpic} where bdid = #{bdid}
mapper.select: select count(bdid) from t_borrowdetail bd,t_borrowapply ba where ba.baid = bd.baid and ba.money = bd.money

select bd.fpic,bd.ypic,bd.qpic,bd.tpic,bd.mpurpose,bd.hksource,bd.suggest,bd.xmdescrip,bd.guarantee,ba.money,bd.nprofit,bd.way,bd.cpname,ba.rname from t_borrowdetail bd,t_borrowapply ba where ba.baid = bd.baid and ba.money = bd.money
